Half Life. Need I say more?

Found this neat indie FPS while looking through the steam store. After putting a few hours in here and there I gotta say this is one heck of a game. Highly Recommended! I really enjoy the thought out level design and the fun, not over challenging, enemies. It's not going to win any awards for graphical prowess but seems like the lo-fi graphics are in right now. Hopefully they come out with a sequel.
